post.author: Enforcer
post.body:
I finally built my computer and am gonna get back into mod making, i have a 8800GTX and run the q4 editor, but the render view window isnt working / the brushes dont show up, and sometimes the grid doesnt show up

anyone have this prob

i got the new drivers installed,

my specs are

intel core duo 6700
4gbs ram
2x80gbhdd
4x200gbhdd
1x500gbhdd
evga 680i mobo

i've disabled the aa in both the game and the video card settings but nothing, i managed to get the grid to popup but cant see the brushes or the viewport

post.author: Enforcer
post.body: dis-regaurd apparently i missed a control option so i got it fixed.

post.author: Enforcer
post.body:
Ok so i got everything fixes except. When i try to render the scene in the editor it wont render it has a non-updating cam view.

any ideas?

post.author: Enforcer
post.body:
OK the q4 + d3 editor DO NOT like the vista theme, something about the aero fx on the window frames doesnt let q4 render in the editor, once disabled it works fine.

hehe nice self help forum i made myself here :-p
